description.narrative: Education duty bearers and rights holders at national and sub-national level have increased capacity to plan for, implement and monitor a child friendly education environment and develop and monitor student learning outcomes.

sector.narrative: System strengthening - curricula and learning materials design (excluding early-learning / pre-primary)
System strengthening - gender-responsive teaching and learning (excluding SRGBV)

title.narrative: UNICEF Programmes in Afghanistan (Adolescent Health and Development)
Afghanistan Country Programme Document 2015-2019 Results Matrix
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
2019 Afghanistan: Mid-term evaluation of the increasing access to basic education and gender equality programme
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Education duty bearers and rights holders at national and sub-national level have increased capacity to plan for, implement and monitor a child friendly education environment and develop and monitor student learning outcomes.

description.narrative: UNICEF, in partnership with the MoE, is finalizing quality education standards for Afghanistan. A baseline study has been commissioned to assess learning outcomes in Accelerated learning Centres, Community Based Classes and hub schools. Furthermore, a formative evaluation on the Girls' Access to Teacher Education (GATE) initiative is under way. | Status:Constrained | As-of Date:27/07/2020

title.narrative: System Strengthening - Learning assessment - Existence of a well-functioning classroom assessment system, including for early grades - score (1-4), see guidance
No. of female teachers with improved pedagogy and effective teaching methods
Validation of national standards for quality education in line with NESP

target.value: 2021:Quality standards dessiminated at national and sub-national levels
